    Kobe Bryant

    Kobe Bean Bryant ▪ Twitter: kobebryant

    (Black Mamba, KB24, Vino, Showboat, Little Flying Warrior)

    Position: Small Forward and Shooting Guard ▪ Shoots: Right

    6-6, 212lb (198cm, 96kg)

    Born: August 23, 1978 (Age: 41-134d) in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania us

    Relatives: Father Joe Bryant; Uncle Chubby Cox

    High School: Lower Merion in Ardmore, Pennsylvania

    Draft: Charlotte Hornets, 1st round (13th pick, 13th overall), 1996 NBA Draft

    NBA Debut: November 3, 1996

    • 18x All Star
    • 2x Scoring Champ
    • 5x NBA Champ
    • 15x All-NBA
    • 12x All-Defensive
    • 1996-97 All-Rookie
    • 4x AS MVP
    • 2x Finals MVP
    • 2007-08 MVP
    +1
    Support us without the ads? Go Ad-Free.

    Transactions

    June 26, 1996: Drafted by the Charlotte Hornets in the 1st round (13th pick) of the 1996 NBA Draft.

    July 11, 1996: Traded by the Charlotte Hornets to the Los Angeles Lakers for Vlade Divac.
